headline: Indiana Michigan Power Receives Order in Large Load Settlement
summary: Indiana Michigan Power (I&M), an American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) company, has received the Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission's (IURC) recent order regarding its large load tariff settlement filed in late 2024. The term "large load" refers to customers who require a substantial amount of energy to operate and maintain their operations, primarily including data centers and large industrial customers.

raw.headline: Indiana Michigan Power Receives Order in Large Load Settlement

The term "large load" refers to customers who require a substantial amount of energy to operate and maintain their operations, primarily including data centers and large industrial customers.
